languages.text: {n}Друкари издевательски смеется.{/n} "{name}, ты что, преподносишь мне подарок? Даже не надейся, что я на него отвечу".

traits.locale_text: {n}Друкари издевательски смеется.{/n} "{name}, ты что, преподносишь мне подарок? Даже не надейся, что я на него отвечу".
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}The Drukhari laughs mockingly.{/n} "What is this? A gift, {name}? Do not for a moment think I will reciprocate."

languages.text: {n}El Drukhari se ríe con sorna.{/n} «¿Qué es esto? ¿Un regalo, {name}? No creas ni por un momento que voy a corresponderte».
languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari laughs mockingly.{/n} "What is this? A gift, {name}? Do not for a moment think I will reciprocate."

traits.locale_text: {n}El Drukhari se ríe con sorna.{/n} «¿Qué es esto? ¿Un regalo, {name}? No creas ni por un momento que voy a corresponderte».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}デュカーリは嘲るように笑った。{/n} 「これは何だ？贈り物か{name}？俺がお返しをするとでも思うなよ」。
languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari laughs mockingly.{/n} "What is this? A gift, {name}? Do not for a moment think I will reciprocate."

traits.locale_text: {n}デュカーリは嘲るように笑った。{/n} 「これは何だ？贈り物か{name}？俺がお返しをするとでも思うなよ」。
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋嘲讽地大笑起来。{/n}“这是什么？礼物吗，{name}？千万别以为我会报答你。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari laughs mockingly.{/n} "What is this? A gift, {name}? Do not for a moment think I will reciprocate."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋嘲讽地大笑起来。{/n}“这是什么？礼物吗，{name}？千万别以为我会报答你。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Le Drukhari s'esclaffe, moqueur.{/n} « Qu'est-ce que c'est que ça ? Un présent, {name} ? N'allez pas vous imaginer que je vous rendrai la pareille. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari laughs mockingly.{/n} "What is this? A gift, {name}? Do not for a moment think I will reciprocate."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le Drukhari s'esclaffe, moqueur.{/n} « Qu'est-ce que c'est que ça ? Un présent, {name} ? N'allez pas vous imaginer que je vous rendrai la pareille. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Der Drukhari lacht spöttisch.{/n} "Was ist das? Ein Geschenk, {name}? Es liegt mir allerdings fern, es zu erwidern."
languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari laughs mockingly.{/n} "What is this? A gift, {name}? Do not for a moment think I will reciprocate."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Drukhari lacht spöttisch.{/n} "Was ist das? Ein Geschenk, {name}? Es liegt mir allerdings fern, es zu erwidern."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Drukhari, alaycı bir kahkaha atıyor.{/n} "Ne bu şimdi? Hediye mi {name}? Karşılığını vermemi bekleme."
languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari laughs mockingly.{/n} "What is this? A gift, {name}? Do not for a moment think I will reciprocate."

traits.locale_text: {n}Drukhari, alaycı bir kahkaha atıyor.{/n} "Ne bu şimdi? Hediye mi bu {name}? Karşılığını vereceğimi bir an bile düşünme."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
